name: Cross Car-Nage
description:
CROSS CAR-NAGE

10,000 years after the Machine Wars, you play as an invincible robot crossing guard.

Protect the pedestrians from speeding cars with your body.
Score points based successful crossings, lose the game when three pedestrians are hit.

- Keep the crosswalk clean for an Easter Egg!

Created in 48 hours for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam, themed "Out of Control".
Feedback is appreciated, this is my first time participating in a Game Jam!

Music by Abstraction: http://abstractionmusic.bandcamp.com/
- Ludem Dare 28 - Track 8
- Ludem Dare 30 - Track 4
- Ludem Dare 38 - Track 4

Thank you to https://managore.itch.io/ for the font! (In Windows version)

Thank you to Yoyo Games for the temporary GMS2 Licence!
